title: Feelings: what are you afraid of?
creator_credit: Abram Murray and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Helps the young viewer understand that everyone experiences fear at some time and that being afraid need not be a subject of embarrassment. Shows a number of children discussing their fears. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
